FuncDef: This command specifies a given SAP or SDP to be used for a static policy override.
CLIs: policy aa-sub { sap <sap-id> | spoke-sdp <sdp-id:vc-id> | transit <transit-aasub-name> } [ create ]
no policy aa-sub { sap <sap-id> | spoke-sdp <sdp-id:vc-id> | transit <transit-aasub-name> }

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the physical port identifier portion of the SAP definition.
Specifies the spoke SDP ID and VC ID. Values-1 to 32767.
Specifies an existing transit subscriber name, up to 32 characters.
Keyword used to create the policy override.
